name: Nihilethic Zombie
description: A medium-sized undead creature connected to the void, characterized by its eerie presence and decay. It can switch between a physical undead form and a ghostly void form.
memorable: The Nihilethic Zombie's ability to shift between forms and its Undead Fortitude makes it a formidable opponent that can endure combat longer than usual zombies.
goals: Primarily to serve its nihileth master and perpetuate decay and darkness.
relations: Typically found alongside nihileths or other void-related undead.
environment: Often encountered in dark, decaying areas or places filled with void energy.
strengths: Resistant to nonmagical physical damage in ghost form, immune to cold, necrotic, and poisonous damage types.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, making it particularly weak against light-based attacks.
attacks: The Nihilethic Zombie uses a melee slam attack in its undead form, dealing both bludgeoning and necrotic damage, or a withering touch attack in ghost form, primarily dealing necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to avoid being reduced to 0 hit points from damage, instead dropping to 1 hit point.
senses: Passive Perception of 8, indicating a low level of alertness to surroundings.
additional_information: Can be switched between Undead and Void Ghost forms at will.
Ignores limitations of air, food, drink, or sleep.
Suffers force damage if it ends its turn inside an object while in ghost form.
Can transfer life force to a nihileth, sacrificing its own hit points.
Has a low armor class, making it susceptible to attacks despite its hit points.
test_queries: zombie that serves a nihileth master
